<js>
JSON.parse(result).related.map(function(o) {
    var detail = 'https://reader.browser.miui.com/api/v2/book/' + o.id;
    var J = JSON.parse(java.ajax(detail)).data;
    return {
        name: o.title,
        author: o.author,
        tags: [J.bookInfo.bookStatus,J.bookInfo.secondCategoryName].join(','),
        num: J.bookInfo.wordCount + 'å­—',
        latest: J.lastChapter.chapterName.replace(/[\(ï¼ˆ].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*[ï¼‰\)]/,'').replace(/\s+/g, ' ') +  String(java.timeFormat(J.lastChapter.updateTime)).replace(/(\d+\/\d+\/\d+).*/,'ï¼ˆ$1ï¼‰'),
        cover: o.image,
        intro: String(o.description).trim(),
        catalogUrl: '/api/v2/chapter/list/' + o.id
    }
}).filter(v =>v.name);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /ï¼ˆç¿»è¯‘.+ï¼‰|å›¾ç‰‡æ¥æº.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        /î™’/g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/ç½‘é¡µç«¯åªå±•ç¤º.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = 'ï½¡â—•â€¿â—•ï½¡' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // å“”å“©å“”å“©ä¸“æ æ’è¡Œæ¦œ
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // æ˜¨å¤©
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // å‰å¤©
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // å‘¨æ¦œ
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // æœˆæ¦œ
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('ï¼Œ', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('å¦‚ä½•æ­£ç¡®åœ°åæ§½'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('æœ‰å£°åŒè¯­ç¾æ–‡ï¼š', '');

              if (/ä¼˜æƒ ç§’æ€|è‹±è¯­è¯¾ç¨‹/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/ï¼ˆ(ç¿»è¯‘ï¼š.+)ï¼‰/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('ä½œè€…ï¼š', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        ç»¼åˆ: 'news',
        ç§‘æŠ€: 'tech',
        å¨±ä¹: 'ent',
        ç¤¾åŒº: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>

var data = java.ajax(url);
data = JSON.parse(data);
data.bitrate.file_link;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",

    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }

        iv: iv,

    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));

  .referrer(baseUrl)
  .header('Content-Type', 'application/json; charset=UTF-8')

  .method(Connection.Method.POST)
  .execute();
